headline: Will Aflac's (AFL) Ethos Partnership Recast Its Digital Distribution and Supplemental Health Narrative?
summary: Ethos recently announced a partnership with Aflac Incorporated, making Aflac’s supplemental cancer insurance available on Ethos’s fully digital life insurance platform to provide rapid, low-friction access to cash benefits for cancer-related costs. This collaboration highlights how Aflac is using third-party technology distribution to widen reach for its supplemental health products and embed coverage directly into modern digital insurance journeys. We’ll now examine how embedding Aflac’s...
